janapathige aandolanathmaka kathawa :

niyangayen wagapaluwu monaragala uk gowinta janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage niyamayen rupiyal miliyana haththapahaka (laksha 750ka) mudal sahanadhara labadimata sini karmantha sanwardhana amathyanshaya piyawara gena atha.me sambandhayen madhyawetha adahas dakwu sini karmantha sanwardhana amathi lakshman senewirathna mahatha - ukgowiya asarana nokara owunwa rakaganimata sidukarana piyawarak lesa meya handinwiya haki athara mehidi kanda dekak yatathe sahanadharaya labadena bawath waga kara thibena hektayar ganana anuwa siyalu gowinta meya labadimata katayuthu karana bawath pawasiya.ee anuwa niri wagawa (maha kannaya)hektayar ekak sandaha rupiyal pandahasakda pala wagawa (maha kannaya)hektayar ekak wenuwen rupiyal dolos dahasakda bija ukwagawa,niri wagawa ha palamu wagawa (maha kannaya)hektayar ekakata rupiyal dahaata dahasak bagin labadimata katayuthu yoda atha.me mudal rajaya aapasu aya nokarana athara dewana kandaya yatathe labadena gowin dirimath kirime dimanawa rupiyal desiye sita pansiya dakwawadi kara atha.idiri kannaye yali aya karaganna padanama yatathe eya kriyathmakayi.wasara 2013di idiripathwu ayawayen idam hektayar eklaksha thisdahasak labadun athara eya ukgowin labu jayagrahanayaki.ikuth wasare palwaththa ha sewanagala karmantha rupiyal miliyana ekdahas harasiya asuhayaka labhayak labu athara in rupiyal miliyana desiya anu hathak ee karmanthashala ithihasaye palamuwathawata gowinta ha sewakayanta diridimana lesa laba dima gana janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata prashansa kala yuthuyi.palanaya kala nohaki niyangaya nisa me wasare ilakkaya wu metrik ton haralakshayaka uk aswanna pramanayata apata langa wiya haki nowunath ape salasumata anuwa sini nishpadanayen me swayanposhanaya kirime gamana itha shakthimathwa idiriyata gena yanna sini karmantha sanwardhana amathyanshaya ithama oonakamen kriya karana bawa ee mahatha wadi duratath pawasiya.
